channel.title: Highscores using MySQL Need help
channel.description:
Alright I really need help trying to set up the Highscores on my server because everytime I do it I get lots of errors when it loads for the first time and it doesn't save anything into the boards upon log out. And if it isn't to much to ask I would like a MySQL anti-injection to prevent the high scores from being hacked.
Please and thank you anyone.

item.title: Highscores using MySQL Need help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Thanks for the anti-inj. I used a tut and got some really weird error on the highscore table. If deathschaos would get on i could get his help since he wrote the tut.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores using MySQL Need help
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

Search for a tutorial or post your errors here; full ‘anti-injection’ proof usage is hard to achieve but I’d use a link such as this.

Read full topic
